unnormalised: Weather's really hitting hard, no? Remember last year, 20/07/2023, the mango crop in Ratnagiri? Total disaster! Rains at the wrong time, and yields were down by like 50%. Heard the ICAR guys are doing some serious research now. My uncle, Kishanlal from Bihar, lost his entire paddy crop on 10/08/2023 due to floods. Hope things improve by Diwali, around 12/11/2024, at least. It's bad for everyone, from farmers to the mandis. Jai Kisan!
